reviews.text:
Title: Integrate SAML SSO with Okta and Azure AD

Description:
Business Need: Implement enterprise-grade Single Sign-On (SSO) to enhance security and streamline user access.
reviews.reason_text: business need description without enforceable behavior

reviews.text: This is crucial for attracting and onboarding enterprise clients who require robust authentication mechanisms.
reviews.reason_text: Explanation of why integration is needed without enforceable behavior

reviews.text: Current Issue: Existing Okta integration has failures that are currently blocking the onboarding of new clients.
reviews.reason_text: Problem statement without enforcing integration issues

reviews.text: Resolving this is a high priority.

reviews.reason_text: Use of 'Requirement:' without enforcing a behavior

reviews.text: The solution must support integration with both Okta and Azure AD as Identity Providers (IdPs) to cater to a wider range of potential clients.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes enforceable integration with Okta and Azure AD
Acceptance criteria list without enforceable behavior

reviews.text: * Metadata upload endpoint for Service Provider (SP) XML is implemented.
reviews.reason_text: Automated endpoint implementation for metadata upload

reviews.text: * Metadata upload endpoint for Identity Provider (IdP) XML is implemented.
reviews.reason_text: Implementation of endpoint for IdP XML metadata upload

reviews.text: * Certificate rotation is automated every 90 days.
* Automatic retry mechanism is implemented for 5xx errors with exponential backoff.
* End-user test flow for both Okta and Azure AD is documented in Confluence.
reviews.reason_text: Documentation of end-user test flows without enforceable behavior

reviews.text:
Labels: security, sso, okta, azure-ad

Priority: High
